Config.Name: Backup schedule
Config.Description: Cron-like string for incremental backups (e.g. `* 2 * * *` triggers everyday at 2 am local time)

Config.Name: Local backup path
Config.Description: User share path to store backups (must be r/w)

Config.Name: Local backup chains to keep
Config.Description: How many old backup chains to keep archived locally under `LOCAL_BACKUP_PATH`. `0` disable backups archiving (default is no limit)

Config.Name: Logfile path
Config.Description: Persistent bind mount for LOGFILE_PATH

Config.Name: Logrotate schedule
Config.Description: Same functioning as `BACKUP_SCHEDULE` but for trigger log rotation (ideally, both variables should run on different schedules)

Config.Name: QEMU disk images path
Config.Description: Edit this config accordingly with your actual path to QEMU images

Config.Name: Rsync backup path
Config.Description: SSH syntax of remote absolute path, e.g. `user@host:/absolute/path/to/folder` to rsync successful backup chain tasks (requires r/w permissions)

Config.Name: Rsync backup chains to keep
Config.Description: Same functioning as `LOCAL_BACKUP_CHAINS_TO_KEEP` (default is no limit)

Config.Name: Rsync arguments
Config.Description: Extra arguments for rsync when sends successful backups to `RSYNC_BACKUP_PATH`, e.g. `-aP --bwlimit=1179648`

Config.Name: SSH Key path
Config.Description: Folder with SSH key (file permissions must be '0600' and belong to user 'root')

Config.Name: Time Zone
Config.Description: Local timezone. Most likely the same on the server running docker (default is container's time)

Config.Name: Virtnbdbackup arguments
Config.Description: Extra arguments passed to virtnbdbackup, in both full and inc backup, e.g. `--compress`

Config.Name: VMs Allow powercycle
Config.Description: When enabled performs a controlled powercycle of VMs, checking incremental backup patch and backup chains as needed. (Default is disabled)

Config.Name: VMs Autostart List
Config.Description: Case Sensitive space separated list of VMs that will be started along with the container

Config.Name: VMs Ignored List
Config.Description: Case Sensitive space separated list of VMs to ignore, so won't be checked or backed up

Config.Name: VMs RAM limit
Config.Description: How much RAM to assign temporarily to a shut down VM to perform backup tasks. Accepts CAPS multipliers without spaces, e.g. `1048576K`, `2048M`, `4G`, etc. otherwise assumes Bytes (default is not to touch RAM values)

Config.Name: Local backup path (container)
Config.Description: Container path where vm-babysitter will search for, and save backup chains of all VMs. The container will fail if does not exist, or r/w permission issues are found

Config.Name: Logfile path (container)
Config.Description: Container path for the main log file

Config.Name: Logrotate config path
Config.Description: Container path to place and read log rotation config

Config.Name: Logrotate settings
Config.Description: Parsed string with *escaped* logrotate config, written in `LOGROTATE_CONFIG_PATH` on startup

Config.Name: SSH options
Config.Description: SSH options for communications with involved hosts, including rsync, and Unraid notifications to localhost

Config.Name: VM Wait time
Config.Description: Maximum time in seconds to await for VMs to confirm it has reached on/off states in certain scenarios

Config.Name: VMs nvram path
Config.Description: Path VMs nvram files

Config.Name: Ovmf binaries path
Config.Description: Required when VMs are in need of a new nvram
